text: Giannotti is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Donato Giannotti (1492–1573), Italian political writer and playwright * Francesco Maria Giannotti (1635–1699), Roman Catholic prelate and Bishop of Segni * Maurilio Giannotti (died 1505), Roman Catholic prelate and Bishop of Calvi Risorta Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Giannotti
